title: 'The blanket got cut in 1 week of usage'
body: 'The blanket got multiple holes in 1 week of usage. Very wel material. Though the other 2 of same brand I bought previously are fine. Unfortunately return window is closed already when I found the holes.... The blanket was a gift for someone so they started using it later'

title: 'Warm and soft and not heavy like our traditional rajai'
'Worst products.Its furr is coming off and causing allergy.. unhealthy to use.'
body: 'Unhealthy product to use...Furr coming off like anything and causing alergy'

title: Good quality and material. Specially good for light winter's
'Absolutely love it!'
body: Love the softness and it provides decent warmth in winters. It's very lightweight, makes it easier for travel.

title: 'Good for ac room'
body: 'Product is nice. Soft and big enough for 3 people imfact two elder person and two kids will be easily covered. I am satisfied. Go for it.'

title: 'Perfect'
body: 'Very soft light weight but warm and cosy for mild winter Too good for this price'
